news_header: Finnair has not cancelled flights to Brussels yet, but the airport has cancelled all flights due to a national strike affecting both departures and arrivals.
news_original_title: Brysselin lentoasema perui kaikki torstaina lähtevät lennot
news_text: Finnair has not yet cancelled its flights to Brussels, despite Brussels Airport cancelling all flights starting Thursday due to a national strike. The strike, which involves field personnel, is in response to planned reforms by the Belgian Government in labor and pension systems. Finnair may cancel one of its three return flights if the strike occurs and is monitoring the situation to keep customers informed of any changes.
